metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33099 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue in the component luaG_runerror of Lua v5.4.4 and below leads to a heap-buffer overflow when a recursive error occurs.

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires pointing the lua interpreter at malicious code possibly only affects lua5.4 mdeslaur> per debian bug, 5.4 only

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
